location_machine_xrefs.condition: Autoplunger still does not work (but the optical sensor is working fine so you never need to plunge more than 1 ball during multiball). The left flipper button occasionally sticks, but hitting it rapidly will release it. Otherwise, the game play great (assuming you don't drain the ball in play when trying to plunge the second ball in battle the kraken multiball, as there is no ball save on this multiball.)

machine_conditions.comment: Autoplunger still does not work (but the optical sensor is working fine so you never need to plunge more than 1 ball during multiball). The left flipper button occasionally sticks, but hitting it rapidly will release it. Otherwise, the game play great (assuming you don't drain the ball in play when trying to plunge the second ball in battle the kraken multiball, as there is no ball save on this multiball.)
Machine in great shape, autoplunger doesn't work but other than that it's in great shape. 50 cents for 1 play. 5 balls.

machine_conditions.comment: Was turned off.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: It had a ball stuck and it seems to always have one stuck any time I've come here the past few months. Seems like there's something wrong with it and it hasn't been fixed yet.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Brand new, and as such, plays really nicely.

machine_conditions.comment: Brand new, and as such, plays really nicely.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: I was there recently and they had an extremely dirty Wheel of Fortune. They RECENTLY changed it out with this BBH. It's somehow more filthy than the WoF was! It literally looks like the playfield has never been cleaned in the decade since this game came out. Even the TOP of the flippers were covered in black filth. Whoever the operator is for these games should be ashamed of themselves. To make it worse, they're charging 75 cents. At the absolute most, this should be 50 cents.

machine_conditions.comment: I was there recently and they had an extremely dirty Wheel of Fortune. They RECENTLY changed it out with this BBH. It's somehow more filthy than the WoF was! It literally looks like the playfield has never been cleaned in the decade since this game came out. Even the TOP of the flippers were covered in black filth. Whoever the operator is for these games should be ashamed of themselves. To make it worse, they're charging 75 cents. At the absolute most, this should be 50 cents.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: The cheap wolverine toy is broken and sitting too low on the playfield. It blocks shots and gets the ball stuck. Wouldn't register the majority of hits to it. Not worth playing at all in that condition.

machine_conditions.comment: The cheap wolverine toy is broken and sitting too low on the playfield. It blocks shots and gets the ball stuck. Wouldn't register the majority of hits to it. Not worth playing at all in that condition.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This game is just getting worse. There's a stuck ball above the captive ball. That leads to one less ball during amp suit multi-ball. machine_conditions.comment: This game is just getting worse. There's a stuck ball above the captive ball. That leads to one less ball during amp suit multi-ball. name: Thornton Hall Bowling Lanes
description: Machine is out of order, but scheduled for repair.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Plays ok other than the cannon fire button is broke.  Had to ask to turn on, but attendant was nice.

machine_conditions.comment: Plays ok other than the cannon fire button is broke.  Had to ask to turn on, but attendant was nice.
Seems to play ok, had to ask to turn on.  Fun game!
Machine is out of order, but has been scheduled for repair.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This poor machine needs a new, loving home. The glass was so insanely filthy. It had some nasty brown substance smeared all over the glass (I'm hoping just mud). Youngstown has some truly disgusting "people". I had to get paper towels and clean the glass just to be able to play. The Iron Monger bash target sits too low when it goes down into the playfield. This causes the ball to either air ball or slow down enough to make getting up the left ramp very difficult.

machine_conditions.comment: This poor machine needs a new, loving home. The glass was so insanely filthy. It had some nasty brown substance smeared all over the glass (I'm hoping just mud). Youngstown has some truly disgusting "people". I had to get paper towels and clean the glass just to be able to play. The Iron Monger bash target sits too low when it goes down into the playfield. This causes the ball to either air ball or slow down enough to make getting up the left ramp very difficult.
Left flipper rubber has been replaced but game is still filthy but seems to work 100%.
Left flipper rubber has now snapped and is laying on the playfield.
Filthy though it seemed to work 100%. Left flipper rubber tip has disintegrated and the right one is on its way. Set on 5 balls, 50 cents per play.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: This is the second Hook I've ever played and it is sooo much better than the first one. It plays better and looks great with the LEDs. The only small issues is that the left flipper could use a bit of adjustment and the game could be set a little steeper. The ball definitely gets floaty at times.

machine_conditions.comment: This is the second Hook I've ever played and it is sooo much better than the first one. It plays better and looks great with the LEDs. The only small issues is that the left flipper could use a bit of adjustment and the game could be set a little steeper. The ball definitely gets floaty at times.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Seems to be broken. Seems like coin switch is jammed, goes to 20 credits no matter what. Got a couple balls to launch but doesn't seem to play right, I suspect due to switch issue.

machine_conditions.comment: Seems to be broken. Seems like coin switch is jammed, goes to 20 credits no matter what. Got a couple balls to launch but doesn't seem to play right, I suspect due to switch issue.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: I was disappointed to see they got rid of AC/DC, but Star Trek is a fun game. I'm almost positve that this is the same machine that was at Tangier Bar and Pizza until recently. It still has the same issue where the start button will stop working after several games. Just turn the game off and back on. It will of course save your credits and work fine for at least a few games before you have to power cycle it again. Priced correctly at 50 cents. Set to 4 balls for some reason.
